mapper.sql: d . DIA_ID ,u.USER_NAME as userName,u.PHOTO as photo,u.AVATAR as avatar,u.SEX as sex,d.USER_ID,d.DIA_DATE,if(d.DIA_TIME='0000-00-00 00:00:00','',d.DIA_TIME) as DIA_TIME,d.DIA_TYPE,d.SUBJECT,if(d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME='0000-00-00 00:00:00','',d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME) as LAST_COMMENT_TIME,d.TO_ALL,d.CRM_DIARY,d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID,d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID,d.READERS, d.USER_TOP_ID, d.SFLAG, d.ALLOW_COMMENT, u.UID as uid

d . DIA_ID ,u.USER_NAME as userName,u.PHOTO as photo,u.AVATAR as avatar,u.SEX as sex,d.USER_ID,d.DIA_DATE,if(d.DIA_TIME=to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'',d.DIA_TIME) as DIA_TIME,d.DIA_TYPE,d.SUBJECT,if(d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME=to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'',d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME) as LAST_COMMENT_TIME,d.TO_ALL,d.CRM_DIARY,d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID,d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID,d.READERS, d.USER_TOP_ID, d.SFLAG, d.ALLOW_COMMENT, u.UID as uid

d . DIA_ID ,u.USER_NAME as userName,u.PHOTO as photo,u.AVATAR as avatar,u.SEX as sex,u.DEPT_ID as deptId,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,d.USER_ID,d.DIA_DATE,if(d.DIA_TIME='0000-00-00 00:00:00','',d.DIA_TIME) as DIA_TIME,d.DIA_TYPE,d.SUBJECT,if(d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME='0000-00-00 00:00:00','',d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME) as LAST_COMMENT_TIME,d.TO_ALL,d.CRM_DIARY,d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID,d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID,d.READERS, d.USER_TOP_ID, d.SFLAG, d.ALLOW_COMMENT, u.UID as uid

d . DIA_ID ,u.USER_NAME as userName,u.PHOTO as photo,u.AVATAR as avatar,u.SEX as sex,u.DEPT_ID as deptId,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,d.USER_ID,d.DIA_DATE,if(d.DIA_TIME=to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'',d.DIA_TIME) as DIA_TIME,d.DIA_TYPE,d.SUBJECT,if(d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME=to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'',d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME) as LAST_COMMENT_TIME,d.TO_ALL,d.CRM_DIARY,d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID,d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID,d.READERS, d.USER_TOP_ID, d.SFLAG, d.ALLOW_COMMENT, u.UID as uid

d . DIA_ID , u.USER_NAME userName, u.PHOTO photo, u.AVATAR avatar, u.SEX sex, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS, u."UID" "UID"

d . DIA_ID , u.USER_NAME userName, u.PHOTO photo, u.AVATAR avatar, u.SEX sex, u.DEPT_ID, u.USER_PRIV_NAME, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS, u."UID" "UID"

d . DIA_ID , u.USER_NAME userName, u.PHOTO photo, u.AVATAR avatar, u.SEX sex, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS, u."UID" "UID"

d . DIA_ID , u.USER_NAME userName, u.PHOTO photo, u.AVATAR avatar, u.SEX sex, u.DEPT_ID, u.USER_PRIV_NAME, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS, u."UID" "UID"

USER_ID ,DIA_DATE,DIA_TIME,DIA_TYPE,SUBJECT,LAST_COMMENT_TIME,TO_ALL,CRM_DIARY,CONTENT, ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_NAME, TO_ID, COMPRESS_CONTENT, READERS,SHARE_ALL ,SEND_REMIND, USER_TOP_ID, SFLAG, ALLOW_COMMENT

USER_ID ,DIA_DATE,DIA_TIME,DIA_TYPE,SUBJECT,LAST_COMMENT_TIME,TO_ALL,CRM_DIARY,"CONTENT", ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_NAME, TO_ID, COMPRESS_CONTENT, READERS,SHARE_ALL ,SEND_REMIND, USER_TOP_ID, SFLAG, ALLOW_COMMENT
mapper.select: SELECT TO_ID from diary WHERE SHARE_ALL = '1' AND USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY DIA_ID DESC
mapper.insert:
select DIARY_DIA_ID_SEQ.nextval as diaId from dual
insert into diary ( DIA_ID,
USER_ID,
DIA_DATE,
DIA_TIME,
SUBJECT,
LAST_COMMENT_TIME,
TO_ALL, CRM_DIARY,
"CONTENT",
ATTACHMENT_ID,
ATTACHMENT_NAME,
TO_ID,
COMPRESS_CONTENT,
READERS,
)
#{diaId},
#{userId},
to_date(#{diaDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
to_date(#{diaTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{subject},
to_date(#{lastCommentTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
0,
#{toAll},
0,
#{crmDiary},
#{content},
#{attachmentId},
#{attachmentName},
#{toId},
#{compressContent},
#{readers},

select DIARY_DIA_ID_SEQ.nextval as diaId from dual
insert into diary ( DIA_ID,
USER_ID,
DIA_DATE,
DIA_TIME,
SUBJECT,
LAST_COMMENT_TIME,
TO_ALL, CRM_DIARY,
CONTENT,
ATTACHMENT_ID,
ATTACHMENT_NAME,
TO_ID,
COMPRESS_CONTENT,
READERS,
)
#{diaId},
#{userId},
to_date(#{diaDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
to_date(#{diaTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{subject},
to_date(#{lastCommentTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
0,
#{toAll},
0,
#{crmDiary},
#{content},
#{attachmentId},
#{attachmentName},
#{toId},
#{compressContent},
#{readers},

insert into diary ()
'',
#{userId},
'0000-00-00',
#{diaDate},
to_timestamp('0000-00-00 00:00:00'),
#{diaTime},
'',
#{diaType},
'',
#{subject},
to_timestamp('0000-00-00 00:00:00'),
#{lastCommentTime},
0,
#{toAll},
0,
#{crmDiary},
'',
#{content},
'',
#{attachmentId},
'',
#{attachmentName},
'',
#{toId},
'',
#{compressContent},
'',
#{readers},
0,
#{shareAll},
0,
#{sendRemind},
'',
#{userTopId},
'1',
#{sFlag},
1,
#{allowComment},
RETURNING DIA_ID
mapper.update:
update diary
USER_ID=#{userId},
DIA_DATE=#{diaDate},
DIA_TIME=#{diaTime},
SUBJECT=#{subject},
LAST_COMMENT_TIME=#{lastCommentTime},
TO_ALL= #{toAll},
CRM_DIARY=#{crmDiary},
DIA_TYPE=#{diaType},
CONTENT=#{content},
ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},
ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},
TO_ID= #{toId},
READERS=#{readers},
USER_TOP_ID=#{userTopId},
SFLAG=#{sFlag},
ALLOW_COMMENT=#{allowComment},
where DIA_ID = #{diaId}

update diary
USER_ID=#{userId},
DIA_DATE= to_date(#{diaDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
DIA_TIME=to_date(#{diaTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
SUBJECT=#{subject},
LAST_COMMENT_TIME=to_date(#{lastCommentTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
TO_ALL= #{toAll},
CRM_DIARY=#{crmDiary},
DIA_TYPE=#{diaType},
CONTENT=#{content},
ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},
ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},
TO_ID= #{toId},
READERS=#{readers},
USER_TOP_ID=#{userTopId},
SFLAG=#{sFlag},
ALLOW_COMMENT=#{allowComment},
where DIA_ID = #{diaId}

update diary
USER_ID=#{userId},
DIA_DATE= to_date(#{diaDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
DIA_TIME=to_date(#{diaTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
SUBJECT=#{subject},
LAST_COMMENT_TIME=to_date(#{lastCommentTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
TO_ALL= #{toAll},
CRM_DIARY=#{crmDiary},
DIA_TYPE=#{diaType},
CONTENT=#{content},
ATTACHMENT_ID=#{attachmentId},
ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName},
TO_ID= #{toId},
READERS=#{readers},
USER_TOP_ID=#{userTopId},
SFLAG=#{sFlag},
ALLOW_COMMENT=#{allowComment},
where DIA_ID = #{diaId}
mapper.select:
select
from "diary" d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "diary_top" dtop ON dtop.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID WHERE d.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
and dtop.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID ORDER BY d.DIA_ID DESC

select
from "diary" d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "diary_top" dtop ON dtop.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID WHERE d.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
and dtop.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID ORDER BY d.DIA_ID DESC

select
,sca.CONTENT_SECRECY
from diary d left join user u on d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID
left join security_content_approval sca ON sca.MODULE_TABLE = 'diary' AND d.DIA_ID = sca.RECORD_ID AND sca.OPERATION_TYPE = 0
where d.DIA_ID = #{diaId}

select
,sca.CONTENT_SECRECY
from diary d left join "user" u on d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID
left join security_content_approval sca ON sca.MODULE_TABLE = 'diary' AND d.DIA_ID = sca.RECORD_ID AND sca.OPERATION_TYPE = 0
where d.DIA_ID = #{diaId}

select
,sca.CONTENT_SECRECY
from diary d left join "user" u on d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID
left join security_content_approval sca ON sca.MODULE_TABLE = 'diary' AND d.DIA_ID = sca.RECORD_ID AND sca.OPERATION_TYPE = 0
where d.DIA_ID = #{diaId}

select
,sca.CONTENT_SECRECY
from diary d left join "user" u on d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID
left join security_content_approval sca ON sca.MODULE_TABLE = 'diary' AND d.DIA_ID = sca.RECORD_ID AND sca.OPERATION_TYPE = 0
where d.DIA_ID = #{diaId}

select
FROM diary d LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' AND ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID DESC, d.DIA_ID DESC

select
from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' AND ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' AND ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY "top".DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID DESC, d.DIA_ID DESC

FROM diary d LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID DESC, d.DIA_ID DESC

from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )

ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

select
from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

select
FROM diary d LEFT JOIN "user" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top "top" ON "top".DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID where ( DIA_TYPE != '2' OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) )
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
ORDER BY "top".DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID DESC, d.DIA_ID DESC

select count(*) from diary d where d.USER_ID=#{userId}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )

select count(*) from diary d where d.USER_ID <>#{userIdOther}
AND d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{subject},'%')
AND d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{content},'%')
and ( d.DIA_TYPE!=#{diaTypeOther} OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userIdOther},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userIdOther},',%')) or TO_ALL=1))

select count(*) from "diary" d where d.USER_ID <>#{userIdOther}
AND d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{subject},'%')
AND d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{content},'%')
and ( d.DIA_TYPE!=#{diaTypeOther} OR ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userIdOther},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userIdOther},',%')) or TO_ALL=1))

from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID!=#{userIdOther}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
AND ( DIA_TYPE != '2' AND ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userIdOther},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userIdOther},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) ) ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID!=#{userIdOther}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
AND ( DIA_TYPE != '2' AND ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userIdOther},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userIdOther},',%')) or TO_ALL=1) ) ORDER BY top.DIA_ID,d.DIA_ID DESC

select
from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID!=#{userIdOther}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )

from diary d INNER JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID=d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID!=#{userIdOther}
AND ( d.SUBJECT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )

select
from diary d,user u where u.USER_ID=d.USER_ID
and DIA_TIME>=#{timeBegin}
and DIA_TIME<=#{timeEnd}
and
( d.USER_ID = #{userid} )
order by d.DIA_ID desc

select
from diary d,"user" u where u.USER_ID=d.USER_ID
and DIA_TIME>=#{timeBegin}
and DIA_TIME<=#{timeEnd}
and
( d.USER_ID = #{userid} )
order by d.DIA_ID desc

#{id}

#{id}

select user_name from "USER" where user_id in
#{id}

select
from diary d,user u where u.USER_ID=d.USER_ID
and ( d.USER_ID=#{userId} or (TO_ALL=1 and d.DIA_TYPE=#{diaType}) or ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) and d.DIA_TYPE=#{diaType}) )
and DIA_DATE like concat(#{time},'%')
and
( d.USER_ID = #{userid} )
order by d.DIA_ID desc

select
from diary d,"user" u where u.USER_ID=d.USER_ID
and ( d.USER_ID=#{userId} or (TO_ALL=1 and d.DIA_TYPE=#{diaType}) or ((TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{userId},',%') OR TO_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) and d.DIA_TYPE=#{diaType}) )
and DIA_DATE like concat(#{time},'%')
and
( d.USER_ID = #{userid} )
order by d.DIA_ID desc

select count(*) FROM diary d LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID AND (top.user_id like concat('%,', #{userId},',%') or top.user_id like concat(#{userId},',%') ) where d.USER_ID in
#{ids}

select count(*) FROM diary d LEFT JOIN diary_top "top" ON "top".DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID AND ("top".user_id like concat('%,', #{userId},',%') or "top".user_id like concat(#{userId},',%') ) where d.USER_ID in
#{ids}

select d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, IF( d.DIA_TIME = '0000-00-00 00:00:00', '', d.DIA_TIME ) AS DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, IF( d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME = '0000-00-00 00:00:00', '', d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME ) AS LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS FROM diary d where DIA_ID = #{id}

select d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, IF( d.DIA_TIME = to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '', d.DIA_TIME ) AS DIA_TIME, d.DIA_TYPE, d.SUBJECT, IF( d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME = to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '', d.LAST_COMMENT_TIME ) AS LAST_COMMENT_TIME, d.TO_ALL, d.CRM_DIARY, d.CONTENT, d.ATTACHMENT_ID, d.ATTACHMENT_NAME, d.TO_ID, d.READERS FROM diary d where DIA_ID = #{id}

select count(*) from diary d LEFT JOIN diary_top top ON top.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID in
#{ids}

select count(*) from diary d LEFT JOIN diary_top "top" ON "top".DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID where d.USER_ID in
#{ids}
SELECT COUNT(DIA_TYPE = '1' OR NULL) AS reported, COUNT(DIA_TYPE = '2' OR NULL) AS notReported FROM diary WHERE (DIA_DATE BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}) AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS allDiaryNumber, COUNT(USER_ID = #{userId} OR NULL) AS myDiaryNumber, COUNT(USER_ID != #{userId} OR NULL ) AS othersDiaryNumber FROM diary

SELECT a.DIA_ID, a.SUBJECT, a.DIA_DATE, b.USER_ID AS commenter FROM diary AS a LEFT JOIN diary_comment AS b ON a.DIA_ID = b.DIA_ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userId} AND a.LAST_COMMENT_TIME != '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ORDER BY a.LAST_COMMENT_TIME DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT a.DIA_ID, a.SUBJECT, a.DIA_DATE, b.USER_ID AS commenter FROM diary AS a LEFT JOIN diary_comment AS b ON a.DIA_ID = b.DIA_ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userId} AND a.LAST_COMMENT_TIME != to_date('0000-00-00 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ORDER BY a.LAST_COMMENT_TIME DESC LIMIT 0, 5
select GROUP_CONCAT(DEPT_ID) from department where find_in_set(#{userId}, MANAGER)

SELECT d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT, d.CONTENT, d.READERS, u.USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME FROM diary d left join user u on u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID left join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID WHERE FIND_IN_SET( #{userId}, d.TO_ID ) AND d.SFLAG = '1'
AND (d.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY d.DIA_DATE DESC

SELECT d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT, d.CONTENT, d.READERS, u.USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME FROM diary d left join "user" u on u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID left join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID WHERE FIND_IN_SET( #{userId}, d.TO_ID ) AND d.SFLAG = '1'
AND (d.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY d.DIA_DATE DESC

SELECT d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT, d.CONTENT, d.READERS, u.USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME FROM diary d left join user u on u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID left join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID WHERE d.USER_ID = #{userId} AND d.SFLAG = '1'
AND (d.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND DIA_TYPE = #{diaType}
ORDER BY d.DIA_DATE DESC

SELECT d.DIA_ID, d.USER_ID, d.DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT, d.CONTENT, d.READERS, u.USER_NAME, dept.DEPT_NAME FROM diary d left join "user" u on u.USER_ID = d.USER_ID left join department dept on dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID WHERE d.USER_ID = #{userId} AND d.SFLAG = '1'
AND (d.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND DIA_TYPE = #{diaType}
ORDER BY d.DIA_DATE DESC

SELECT DIA_ID, USER_ID, DIA_DATE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, READERS FROM diary
SFLAG = '1'
AND (SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND USER_ID IN
#{userBottomId}
ORDER BY DIA_DATE DESC

select * from diary
and (USER_ID=#{userId} or TO_ID like concat('%',#{userId},',%') )
AND ( SUBJECT like concat('%',#{subject},'%') or CONTENT like concat('%',#{subject},'%')
or SUBJECT like concat ('%',#{str},'%') or CONTENT like concat ('%',#{str},'%')
or ATTACHMENT_ID like concat ('%',#{attachId},'%')
)
